english_example_sentence: You will not touch your mother's valuable antique vase.
russian_example_sentence: Ты не тронешь ценную антикварную вазу твоей матери.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen, annenin o değerli antika vazosuna dokunmayacaksın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen, annenin o değerli antika vazosuna ______.
